text:
Jerry Joseph Casale (September 27, 1933 – February 9, 2019) was an American baseball player. He was a starting pitcher in Major League Baseball who played for three different teams between 1958 and 1962. Casale played for the Boston Red Sox, Los Angeles Angels and the Detroit Tigers. He was born in Brooklyn, New York.
Casale died on February 9, 2019 in Paramus, New Jersey at the age of 85.
